it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.blockwise

Class BlockwiseTransactionServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.blockwise.BlockwiseTransactionServer

  • public class BlockwiseTransactionServer
extends java.lang.Object
    Server-side support for blockwise transfers (RFC 7959).

    It handles the request/response exchange in accord to the CoAP blockwise transfer extension.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BlockwiseTransactionServer(CoapProvider coap_provider, CoapRequest req, int server_max_size, BlockwiseTransactionServerListener listener)
      Creates a new BlockwiseTransactionServer.
